## Hello there! 

My name is Aleksandr Tsyplenkov and this is my personal website (WIP). Feel free to learn more [**about me**](./about.qmd) and take a look at my portfolio in the [**My Projects**](./projects.qmd) section!

I'm currently a 4th year undergraduate student pursuing a bachelor degree in [Cartography and Geoinformatics](https://carto.geogr.msu.ru/site/) at Lomonosov Moscow State University ([Faculty of Geography](https://www.eng.geogr.msu.ru/?changed_lang=true)).

My interests are: *spatial data visualization* & *map design*, *digital elevation modelling* (my thesis is connected with DEM smoothing) and *spatial analysis*.
